adm_tech_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of <tech> technologies.

dip_tech_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of <tech> technologies.

mil_tech_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of <tech> technologies.

administrative_efficiency.description: Modifies the base core creation cost, diplo-annexation costs and the impact of province development on overextension and warscore cost. (Multiplicative)

advisor_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of advisors. (Multiplicative)

advisor_pool.description: Adds to the pool size for advisors. (Additive)

ae_impact.description: Modifies the total size of Aggressive Expansion gained during actions that confer it. (Multiplicative)

all_power_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of every action that costs monarch power. (Multiplicative)

amount_of_banners.description: Modifies the maximum amount of banners available. (Multiplicative)

army_tradition.description: Adds to the rate of Army Tradition gained each year. (Additive)

army_tradition_decay.description: Adds to the decay rate of Army Tradition. (Additive)

army_tradition_from_battle.description: Modifies the Army Tradition bonus when gained through battles. (Multiplicative)

artillery_bonus_vs_fort.description: Adds to the bonus artillery get versus forts. (Additive)

artillery_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of artillery units. (Multiplicative)

artillery_power.description: Modifies the power artillery gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

autonomy_change_time.description: Modifies the cooldown for the autonomy reduction and increase buttons. (Multiplicative)

backrow_artillery_damage.description: Modifies the bonus damage artillery inflict when in the backrow during combat. (Multiplicative)

blockade_efficiency.description: Modifies the efficiency of blockades against enemies. (Multiplicative)

capture_ship_chance.description: Adds to the chance for ship capture during naval battles. (Additive)

caravan_power.description: Modifies the bonus trade power inland nodes receive from trade power sources. (Multiplicative)

cav_to_inf_ratio.description: Adds to the ratio required to negate the Insufficient Support penalty. (Additive)

cavalry_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of cavalry units. (Multiplicative)

cavalry_flanking.description: Modifies the effectiveness of cavalry flanking. (Multiplicative)

cavalry_power.description: Modifies the power cavalry gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

church_power_modifier.description: Modifies the effectiveness of church power gains. (Multiplicative)

colonist_placement_chance.description: Adds to the base colonial placement chance for colonists, which is the chance that additional settlers will be spawned whilst the colonist is present. (Additive)

colonists.description: Modifies the base colonist count for a country. (Additive)

core_creation.description: Modifies the base core creation cost. (Multiplicative)

core_decay_on_your_own.description: Modifies the rate at which the cores of a country will decay when under the ownership of a different country. (Multiplicative)

culture_conversion_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for culture conversion in provinces. (Multiplicative)

defensiveness.description: Modifies the siege defensiveness that affects siege phase length. (Multiplicative)

development_cost.description: Modifies the development cost for provinces. (Multiplicative)

devotion.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of devotion.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use devotion. (Additive)

diplomatic_annexation_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for annexation. (Multiplicative)

diplomatic_reputation.description: Adds to a country's diplomatic reputation. (Additive)

diplomatic_upkeep.description: Adds to the maximum number of free diplomatic relations. (Additive)

diplomats.description: Adds to a country's diplomat count. (Additive)

discipline.description: Modifies the discipline of land units. (Multiplicative)

discovered_relations_impact.description: Modifies the relations impact applied to a country when discovered commiting an espionage action. (Multiplicative)

drill_decay_modifier.description: Modifies the army drill decay rate per year. (Multiplicative)

drill_gain_modifier.description: Modifies the army drill gains while drilling (Multiplicative)

embargo_efficiency.description: Modifies the effectiveness of embargoing another country. (Multiplicative)

embracement_cost.description: Modifies the ducat cost for embracing an institution. (Multiplicative)

enemy_core_creation.description: Modifies the cost of coring provinces for enemies that have your cores. (Multiplicative)

enforce_religion_cost.description: Modifies the warscore cost for the Enforce Religion peace term. (Multiplicative)

envoy_travel_time.description: Modifies diplomat travel time during actions. (Multiplicative)

fabricate_claims_cost.description: Modifies diplomatic power cost for fabricating claim. (Multiplicative)

female_advisor_chance.description: Modifies the base chance rate for female advisors. (Multiplicative)

fire_damage.description: Modifies the fire damage done by land units. (Multiplicative)

fire_damage_received.description: Modifies the fire damage taken by land units. (Multiplicative)

fort_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the base fort maintenance cost. (Multiplicative)

free_leader_pool.description: Adds to the maximum amount of free leaders. (Additive)

galley_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of galley ships. (Multiplicative)

galley_power.description: Modifies the power galley ships gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

garrison_size.description: Modifies the base garrison size in provinces. (Multiplicative)

general_cost.description: Modifies the base military power cost for recruiting Generals. (Multiplicative)

global_autonomy.description: Adds to the monthly rate of autonomy in owned provinces. (Additive)

global_colonial_growth.description: Adds to the base yearly colonial growth gain. (Additive)

global_foreign_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power for a country in tradenodes that are not domestic. (Multiplicative)

global_garrison_growth.description: Modifies the base garrison growth in provinces. (Multiplicative)

global_heretic_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the base missionary strength against heretic religions. (Additive)

global_institution_spread.description: Modifies the rate of spread for institutions in all owned provinces. (Multiplicative)

global_manpower.description: Adds to the country's total manpower pool. 1 equals 1000 men. (Additive)

global_manpower_modifier.description: Modifies a country's total manpower pool. (Multiplicative)

global_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the base missionary strength against all religions. (Additive)

global_naval_engagement_modifier.description: Modifies the maximum naval engagement width. (Multiplicative)

global_own_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power for a country in tradenodes that are domestic. (Multiplicative)

global_prov_trade_power_modifier.description: Modifies the base trade power of owned provinces. (Multiplicative)

global_regiment_cost.description: Modifies the base unit cost for all land units. (Multiplicative)

global_regiment_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the base speed at which land units are recruited. (Multiplicative)

global_sailors.description: Adds to a country's maximum sailor pool. (Additive)

global_sailors_modifier.description: Modifies a country's maximum sailor pool. (Multiplicative)

global_ship_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of all ships. (Multiplicative)

global_ship_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the base recruitmend speed of all ships. (Multiplicative)

global_ship_repair.description: Modifies the base repair speed (in port) of all ships. (Multiplicative)

global_ship_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power ships grant when protecting trade. (Multiplicative)

global_spy_defence.description: Modifies the base effectiveness of counter-espionage against enemy spies. (Multiplicative)

global_tariffs.description: Modifies the tariff income from colonial nations. (Multiplicative)

global_tax_income.description: Adds to the base tax income per year (i.e. 12 equals 1 extra per month). (Additive)

global_tax_modifier.description: Modifies the base tax income by a percentage. (Multiplicative)

global_trade_goods_size_modifier.description: Modifies the base trade good size of owned provinces. (Multiplicative)

global_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power in all tradenodes for a country. (Multiplicative)

global_unrest.description: Adds to the base unrest value. (Additive)

harmonization_speed.description: Modifies the rate at which harmonization occurs. (Multiplicative)

harsh_treatment_cost.description: Modifies the military power cost for using harsh treatment. (Multiplicative)

heavy_ship_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of heavy ships. (Multiplicative)

heavy_ship_power.description: Modifies the power heavy ships gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

heir_chance.description: Modifies the base chance for an heir during the heir generation tick. (Multiplicative)

horde_unity.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of horde unity.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use horde unity. (Additive)

hostile_attrition.description: Adss to the attrition enemies take in a country's provinces. (Additive)

idea_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of purchasable ideas. (Multiplicative)

imperial_authority.description: Modifies the impact of Imperial Authority gains. (Multiplicative)

imperial_authority_value.description: Adds to the rate of Imperial Authority gained per month. (Additive)

imperial_mandate.description: Adds to the rate of Mandate gained per month. (Additive)

improve_relation_modifier.description: Modifies the speed of the Improve Relations diplomatic action. (Multiplicative)

infantry_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of infantry units. (Multiplicative)

infantry_power.description: Modifies the power infantry gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

inflation_action_cost.description: Modifies the administrative power cost for reducing inflation. (Multiplicative)

inflation_reduction.description: Adds to the base yearly inflation rate. (Additive)

innovativeness_gain.description: Modifies the amount of Innovativeness gained (Multiplicative)

institution_spread_from_true_faith.description: Modifies the rate of spread for institutions in owned provinces following the owner's religion. (Multiplicative)

interest.description: Adds to the base interest rate. (Additive)

land_attrition.description: Modifies the attrition taken by land units. (Multiplicative)

land_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the maintenance cost of all land units. (Multiplicative)

land_morale.description: Modifies the land morale of land units. (Multiplicative)

leader_land_fire.description: Adds to the minimum fire pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

leader_land_manuever.description: Adds to the minimum manuever pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

leader_land_shock.description: Adds to the minimum shock pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

leader_naval_fire.description: Adds to the minimum fire pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

leader_naval_manuever.description: Adds to the minimum manuever pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

leader_naval_shock.description: Adds to the minimum shock pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

leader_siege.description: Adds to the minimum siege pip count a leader can be generated with. (Additive)

legitimacy.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of legitimacy.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use legitimacy. (Additive)

liberty_desire.description: Adds to subject liberty desire against their overlord. (Additive)

liberty_desire_from_subject_development.description: Adds to the subject liberty desire from development against their overlord. (Multiplicative)

light_ship_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of light ships. (Multiplicative)

light_ship_power.description: Modifies the power light ships gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

loot_amount.description: Modifies the amount of loot taken at once during looting. (Multiplicative)

manpower_recovery_speed.description: Modifies the rate at which manpower is recovered. (Multiplicative)

max_absolutism.description: Adds to the maximum value of absolutism. Internally absolutism bonuses do not scale above 100. (Additive)

max_states.description: Adds to the maximum number of states a country can support. (Additive)

merc_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the maintenance cost of all mercenary units. (Multiplicative)

mercenary_cost.description: Modifies the base cost for mercenary units. (Multiplicative)

mercenary_discipline.description: Modifies the discipline of mercenary units. (Multiplicative)

merchants.description: Adds to the base merchant count for a country. (Additive)

meritocracy.description: Adds to the yearly rate of meritocracy. Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use meritocracy. (Additive)

migration_cooldown.description: Modifies the cooldown for the migration action for primitive nations that can migrate. (Multiplicative)

min_autonomy.description: Sets the minimum autonomy level allowed in all owned provinces. (Constant)

missionaries.description: Adds to the base missionary count for a country. (Additive)

monarch_admin_power.description:
Adds to the base ADM skill a ruler, heir and consort can be generated with.
Does not effect rulers created with fixed = yes. (Additive)

monarch_diplomatic_power.description:
Adds to the base DIP skill a ruler, heir and consort can be generated with.
Does not effect rulers created with fixed = yes. (Additive)

monarch_military_power.description:
Adds to the base MIL skill a ruler, heir and consort can be generated with.
Does not effect rulers created with fixed = yes. (Additive)

monthly_fervor_increase.description: Adds to the rate of fervor gained per month. (Additive)

monthly_karma.description: Adds to the rate of karma gained per month. (Additive)

monthly_militarized_society.description: Adds to the monthly rate of militarisation for governments with the militarisation mechanic. (Additive)

monthly_piety.description: Adds to the rate of piety gained per month. (Additive)

monthly_splendor.description: Adds to the monthly rate of splendor points. (Additive)

movement_speed.description: Modifies the base movement speed for all land units. (Multiplicative)

native_advancement_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of native advancements. (Multiplicative)

native_assimilation.description: Modifies the bonus from assimilation in colonies. Native assimilation is bonus to goods produced depends on the native population. (Multiplicative)

native_uprising_chance.description: Adds to the chance of native uprisings in a colony province. (Multiplicative)

naval_attrition.description: Modifies the naval attrition taken by ships. (Multiplicative)

naval_forcelimit.description: Adds to a country's naval forcelimit. (Additive)

naval_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the naval maintenance for all ships. (Multiplicative)

naval_morale.description: Modifies the naval morale of all ships. (Multiplicative)

naval_tradition_from_battle.description: Modifies the base Navy Tradition gained from battles. (Multiplicative)

navy_tradition.description: Adds to the yearly Navy Tradition rate. (Additive)

navy_tradition_decay.description: Adds to the decay rate of Navy Tradition. (Additive)

num_accepted_cultures.description: Adds to the maximum number of accepted cultures a country can have. (Additive)

papal_influence.description: Adds to the rate of papal influence gained per year. (Additive)

placed_merchant_power.description: Modifies the additional trade power when a merchant present in a tradenode. (Additive)

prestige.description: Adds to the base yearly rate of prestige. (Additive)

prestige_decay.description: Adds to the base rate of prestige decay. (Additive)

prestige_from_land.description: Modifies the prestige bonus from combat. (Multiplicative)

prestige_from_naval.description: Modifies the prestige gained through naval battles. (Multiplicative)

prestige_per_development_from_conversion.description: Adds to the prestige bonus gained per development when successfully converting a province to a state religion. (Additive)

privateer_efficiency.description: Modifies the effectiveness of privateers in a tradenode. (Multiplicative)

production_efficiency.description: Modifies the base production income by a percentage. (Multiplicative)

promote_culture_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for promoting a culture. (Multiplicative)

province_warscore_cost.description: Modifies the warscore cost for taking provinces. (Multiplicative)

range.description: Modifies the base colonisation range, used for exploration, colonisation and coring province that border sea. (Multiplicative)

raze_power_gain.description: Modifies the amount of monarch power gained from razing. (Multiplicative)

rebel_support_efficiency.description: Modifies the effectiveness of supported rebels in other countries. (Multiplicative)

recover_army_morale_speed.description: Modifies the army morale recovery speed. (Multiplicative)

recover_navy_morale_speed.description: Modifies the morale recovery rate of ships. (Multiplicative)

reduced_liberty_desire.description: Adds to the liberty desire subjects have against their overlord. Applied to the overlord. (Additive)

reduced_liberty_desire_on_same_continent.description: Adds to the liberty desire subjects have against their overlord if on the same continent. Applied to the overlord. (Additive)

reinforce_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the cost of reinforcements when units are reinforced. (Multiplicative)

reinforce_speed.description: Modifies the rate at which units are reinforced with new men. (Multiplicative)

religious_unity.description: Adds to the base religious unity value for a country. (Additive)

republican_tradition.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of republican tradition.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use republican tradition. (Additive)

reserves_organisation.description: Modifies the morale damage taken by units in reserves (i.e. not in battle, but engaged with another unit) (Multiplicative)

rival_border_fort_maintenance.description: Modifies the base fort maintenance cost for forts in provinces that border rivals. (Multiplicative)

rival_change_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost to change rivals. (Multiplicative)

sailor_maintenance_modifer.description: Modifies the sailor maintenance for all ships. (Multiplicative)

sailors_recovery_speed.description: Modifies the sailor recovery rate for all ships. (Multiplicative)

same_culture_advisor_cost.description: Modifies the advisor cost for advisors that share the same culture as the country's court they're in. (Multiplicative)

ship_durability.description: Modifies the durability of all ships. (discipline for ships) (Multiplicative)

ship_power_propagation.description: Modifies the propagation of trade power from ships protecting trade. (Multiplicative)

shock_damage.description: Modifies the shock damage done by land units. (Multiplicative)

shock_damage_received.description: Modifies the shock damage taken by land units. (Multiplicative)

siege_ability.description: Modifies the siege ability that affects siege phase length. Reverse concept of defensiveness. (Multiplicative)

siege_blockade_progress.description: Modifies the bonus siege status by blockaded. (Additive)

spy_offence.description: Modifies the base effectiveness of spies against enemies. (Multiplicative)

stability_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the administrative power cost of raising stability. (Multiplicative)

state_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the maintenance cost for states. (Multiplicative)

sunk_ship_morale_hit_recieved.description: Modifies the morale damage taken during battle by losing ships. (Multiplicative)

technology_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of all technologies. (Multiplicative)

tolerance_heathen.description: Adds to the base tolerance for heathens within a country. (Additive)

tolerance_heretic.description: Adds to the base tolerance for heretics within a country. (Additive)

tolerance_own.description: Adds to the base tolerance for the true faith within a country. (Additive)

trade_efficiency.description: Modifies a country's trade income. (Maximum is 200%) (Multiplicative)

trade_range_modifier.description: Modifies the trade range used to determine if a country can place a merchant in a tradenode. (Multiplicative)

trade_steering.description: Modifies the bonus to trade power used for steering when determining which outgoing node trade is steered to. If you have a merchant present, it also slightly increases the outgoing value. (Multiplicative)

transport_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of transport ships. (Multiplicative)

transport_power.description: Modifies the power transport ships gain from unit pips. (Multiplicative)

unjustified_demands.description: Modifies the weighting of demands in peace treaties. (Multiplicative)

vassal_forcelimit_bonus.description: Modifies the bonus to a country's forcelimit from their subjects. (Multiplicative)

vassal_income.description: Modifies the bonus to a country's income from their subjects. (Multiplicative)

war_exhaustion.description: Adds to the monthly war exhaustion rate. (Additive)

war_exhaustion_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for reducing war exhaustion. (Multiplicative)

war_taxes_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the military power cost for raising war taxes. (Multiplicative)

warscore_cost_vs_other_religion.description: Modifies the warscore costs for peace terms whilst in war against countries of a different religion. (Multiplicative)

yearly_absolutism.description: Adds to the yearly base rate of absolutism. (Additive)

yearly_army_professionalism.description: Modifies the rate of Army Professionalism gained each year. (Multiplicative)

yearly_corruption.description: Adds to the yearly rate of corruption. (Additive)

yearly_harmony.description: Adds to the rate of harmony gained per year. (Additive)

yearly_tribal_allegiance.description: Adds to the yearly rate of tribal allegiance for governments with the tribal allegiance mechanic. (Additive)

years_of_nationalism.description: Adds to the base nationalism value of provinces when conquered. (Additive)

factions.description:
Adds to the monthly rate of faction influence. 
Generated automatically for all factions in /Europa Universalis IV/common/factions. (Additive)

technology_groups.description:
Modifies the monarch power cost of <tech> technologies. 
Generated automatically for all technology tables in /Europa Universalis IV/common/technology.txt. (Multiplicative)
